Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery slightly ribbed vessel, the fabric is partly greyish in section, the interior is encrusted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and faint traces of at least two lines of black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394776) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394776)
